review_data.title: It is a sidewalk cafe/beerhall with basic...
review_data.content: It is a sidewalk cafe/beerhall with basic but tasty local food at (for Switzerland) affordable prices. Service is harried but adequate. For the best experience grab an outside table-- it's located on a busy pedestrian mall and is a great place to people watch.
